```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(readr)
logs <- read_csv("data/logs.csv", col_types = cols(row_id = col_integer(), 
    player_id = col_integer(), school = col_integer(), 
    date = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d"), 
    event_id = col_integer(), event_time = col_skip(), 
    event_time_dbl = col_number(), stack_id = col_integer(), 
    data_headers = col_skip(), data_values = col_skip(), 
    skill_level_know = col_number(), skill_level_priority = col_number(), 
    skill_level_people = col_number(), skill_level_refusal = col_number(), 
    skill_level_me = col_number(), minigame_id = col_number(), 
    minigame_level = col_number(), skill_id = col_character(), 
    old_skill_point = col_number(), new_skill_point = col_number(), 
    pan_scene_start_left = col_number(), 
    pan_scene_end_left = col_number(), scan_start_point = col_skip(), 
    scan_end_point = col_skip(), sense_id = col_integer(), 
    animatic_id = col_character(), animatic_time_elapsed = col_skip(), 
    animatic_time_left = col_skip(), avatar_age = col_number(), 
    aa_level_id = col_integer(), chunk_id = col_integer(), 
    piece_id = col_integer(), old_choice_id = col_integer(), 
    old_label = col_character(), choice_id = col_integer(), 
    new_choice_id = col_integer()))

S5_scores_cleaned <- read_csv("data/S5_scores_cleaned.csv")
```
